side1.recipientAddress: Tipton [90 Mf H Grim] R#4 Iowa
side1.WrittenText: "Hello John Old Stick How do these [april showers agree] with you? May be at your town soon. Everything is fine and doozy."

side2.PrintedText: Votes for Women The spirit of 1776 to-day "No Taxation Without Representation"

postcard.Notes: Post Office ink stamp and Sender handwriting indicate it was written/sent from Dixon, Iowa
